resources.string: Do you want to download this brand ?

body.p: \t Saifee Smart Showroom is an app owned by Saifee ceramics & Building Products.
\n\n \tWe are into tiles business since a decade and have seen many changes in Tiles size, Designs, Technology and also customers.
\n\n\t The investment in this trade is never ending as we have to keep ourselves updated with products and displays.
\n\n\t With this we came across an idea about developing a smart showroom application which would enhance our sales and can make our resource work smarter.
\n\n\t With this app you can design Unlimited Bathrooms and living rooms and possibility to design different pattern is limitless.
\n\n\t Our Video presentation with the app features and benefits will be updated soon here.

p.b: \n\n\t\t"With Saifee Smart Showroom, You can now do smart Business"

resources.string: Click on button below to start cropping image.
Resize/Orient Image to Fit Face Inside the Orange Circle
To continue please register your device. \n\nRegistration

If you need any support or have any issue you can contact us. We shall respond to your messages as early as possible.

	
• Mobile : +91 8606 241 911

	 • Skype : saifeeceramics

	 • E-Mail : support@saifeesmartshowroom.com
\t\tIn order to activate your Smart Showroom app kindly login to www.saifeesmartshowroom.com\n and complete the registration and payment procedure.
